testimonials.title: Trusted by Job Seekers
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who have transformed their job search with Qrafts

user1.name: Sarah Johnson
user1.content: Qrafts completely changed how I organize my job applications. The AI insights helped me land interviews at top tech companies. I cannot imagine job hunting without it!

user2.name: Michael Rodriguez
user2.content: The interview prep feature is incredible. Being able to track each company and interviewer made me feel so much more prepared. Landed my dream job in just 3 weeks!

user3.name: Alex Chen
user3.content: Finally, a tool that understands the job search struggle. The automated reminders kept me on track, and the AI assistant answered all my questions. Five stars!

examples.improve: How can I improve my application answers?
examples.interview: What should I prepare for my next interview?
examples.track: How can I track my job applications better?

responses.improve:
Great question! I can help you craft stronger answers by:

1. Analyzing the job description to understand key requirements
2. Suggesting specific examples from your experience
3. Structuring your response using the STAR method
4. Highlighting relevant achievements

Sign up to get personalized feedback on your actual applications!
responses.interview:
I'd be happy to help you prepare! Here's what I recommend:

1. Research the company's recent news and projects
2. Prepare 2-3 stories for common behavioral questions
3. Review the job requirements and match them to your skills
4. Prepare thoughtful questions for the interviewer

With a Qrafts account, I can analyze your interviewer's LinkedIn profile and give you personalized prep tips!
responses.resume:
I can help you optimize your resume by:

1. Highlighting relevant skills for each role
2. Quantifying your achievements with metrics
3. Using action verbs and industry keywords
4. Ensuring ATS-friendly formatting

Sign up to get AI-powered resume analysis tailored to specific job postings!
responses.jobFit:
I can analyze how well a position matches your profile by:

1. Comparing job requirements with your skills
2. Identifying gaps and how to address them
3. Suggesting talking points for your application
4. Calculating a fit score

Create an account to get detailed fit analysis for all your applications!
responses.organize:
Qrafts helps you stay organized with:

1. A centralized dashboard for all applications
2. Timeline view of interviews and deadlines
3. Automated reminders for follow-ups
4. Company research notes in one place

Sign up free to start organizing your job search today!
responses.default:
I'm here to help with your job search! I can assist with:

• Improving application answers
• Interview preparation
• Resume optimization
• Job fit analysis
• Application tracking

Sign up to get personalized AI assistance throughout your entire job search journey!
